Subclasses of Tower in fr.imac.javawars.engine
 class TowerBombe
          Attack strong and in aoe
 class TowerBounce
          Attack one agents and (number of bounce) other agent around
 class TowerFreeze
          A freeze tower : attack an agent an other near him related to the tower radius
 class TowerLaser
          A Laser Tower attacks louder when attacking the same agent.
 class TowerMachinegun
          Tower which attack really fast but projectiles are not really strong
 class TowerMissile
          A basic tower which send little missile to a unit.
 class TowerPoison
          Make dommage every 0.5s
 class TowerSniper
          Attack far way, strong but not speed
